channel.title: lives on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in lives on Barefoot Rob

item.title: interesting connection
item.description: 23:56 Saturday 03 June 2017 JST Yesterday in my online men’s group I used my time to look at why I get so unreasonably pissed off when I have to repeat myself. Guided via questions, it went something like this. Where do you feel this anger? In my throat, like it is lodged in there. A solid steel ball blocking everything. Does this solid steel ball have a temperature?
